Reviews.Title: Bought it for my wife who does Photagraphy part time
Reviews.Author: David L Austin
Reviews.Content: I thought the soft box was different, but was a good good value. I wanted her to have a slave flash to go with her 580 EX for portrait shots

Reviews.Title: speedlighte
Reviews.Author: terri-lynn
Reviews.Content: love this speedlight! exactly what i needed! love my canon products, i would never switch to any other brand! thank you!

Reviews.Title: Canon speedlite 430EX II
Reviews.Author: Eddie Shaw
Reviews.Content: If you are going to learn to take great pictures indoors or outdoors sooner or later you will need an external flash, and I highly recommend Canon speedlite. I used It on the first day that I recieved It and was amazed how different the pictures looked with a external flash.
